meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, 6FN Conference Room and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Kiest Tennis Center
agenda_items.description: Authorize the contract extension for up to twenty-four (24) months with Dallas Tennis Association to provide a full-service tennis program at the Kiest Tennis Center located at 2324 West Kiest Boulevard, Dallas Texas, 75224, for the period of January 30, 2024, through January 29, 2026.

agenda_items.title: Fair Park
agenda_items.description: Authorize the naming of a large picnic area at the new 18-acre Community Park located at 1200 Second Avenue as the Perot Family Picnic Area. This is a 40-year naming opportunity which is in compliance with the Park Board Park Naming Policy.

agenda_items.title: Kiest Park
agenda_items.description: Authorize the placement of a Texas State Historical Marker at Kiest Park, Kiest Memorial Garden located at 3080 South Hampton Road.

agenda_items.title: Land Acquisition
agenda_items.description: Authorize acquisition from Texas Department of Housing and Community Affairs of approximately 1,026,976 square feet of land (23.58 acres) located at 12700 Kleberg Road for a proposed new park.

agenda_items.title: Northaven Trail
agenda_items.description: Authorize the dedication plaque installed at Northaven Trail Bridge at 11222 North Central Expressway.

agenda_items.title: Workshop
agenda_items.description: 2024 Bond Program: Funding Strategies, Operation and Maintenance Costs and Looking to the Future

agenda_items.title: Other/Non-Action Items
agenda_items.description: Staff Announcements – Upcoming Park and Recreation Department Events

financial_items.description: No cost consideration to the City for naming opportunities and historical markers.
Authorize acquisition of land for a proposed new park.
